exceptions.exn: The LHS of zip_rcons (zip (rcons _ _) (rcons _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of unzip1_zip (unzip1 (zip _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H1 : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> unzip1 (zip s t) = s S : Type T : Type s : seq (S * T) h0 : S h1 : T H, H0 : forall (s t : seq T) (hs ht : T), size s = size t -> zip (rcons s hs) (rcons t ht) = rcons (zip s t) (hs, ht) Unable to unify "(fix rcons (s : seq S) (z : S) {struct s} : seq S := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end) (unzip1 s) h0" with "[seq fst i | i <- (fix rcons (s : seq (S * T)) (z : S * T) {struct s} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end) s (h0, h1)]".

original: rewrite /unzip1 /rcons. rewrite zip_rcons. rewrite unzip1_zip. rewrite -/(unzip1 s) -/(unzip1 s) -/(unzip1 s). reflexivity.
